summary: The tools package bundles a set of command‑line utilities and helper functions that aid development workflows: measuring asynchronous write performance, validating repository changes against allowed patterns, computing cryptographic hashes for files, cleaning up selected modified files, and generating structured textual content with hierarchical sections.
business_intent: These utilities are intended to accelerate and automate routine development tasks—providing quick performance insights, enforcing naming and pattern rules on code changes, ensuring file integrity, removing unwanted modifications, and simplifying the creation of formatted documents—thereby improving productivity and code quality.
